SNMF
===========

SNMF computes least-squares estimates of ancestry proportions and ancestral allelic frequencies (Frichot et al., 2014). It could be used to calculate ancestries in the populations.

.. code-block:: yaml

    PARAMS:
        SNMF:
            K_MIN : 2
            K_MAX : 6
            REPETITIONS : 5
            NB : 2
            BEST_K : 4


+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| Parameter                  | Description                                                 |
+============================+=============================================================+
| K_MIN                      | Minimal number of latent factors                            |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| K_MAX                      | Maximal number of latent factors                            |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| REPETITIONS                | Number of repetitions                                       |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| NB                         | Number of .bed files generated by iKISS in the KMERS_MODULE,|
|                            | over which SNMF is calculated                               |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| BEST_K                     | Expected best latent factor                                 |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
